page.title: 18SHEERNESS CHAMBER OF TRADE
page.content: {THE CHAMBER OF TRADE}HAS ROUGHLY 70 MEMBERS AND TRIES TO LOOK AFTER THE LOCAL COMMUNITY BY DOING SUCH THINGS AS TIDYING THE SHOP FRONTS AND PUTTING FLOWERS AROUND THE TOWN. THE CHAMBER OF TRADE TRIES TO ENCOURAGE ON-ISLAND SHOPPING AND ALSO TRIES TO ENCOURAGE THE AUTHORITIES TO USE LOCAL CONTRACTORS. THE MEMBERSHIP OF THE CHAMBER HAS STAYED ROUGHLY THE SAME OVER THE LAST 5 YEARS BECAUSE, ALTHOUGH BUSINESSES HAVE GONE BANKRUPT NEW BUSINESSES HAVE TAKEN THEIR PLACE. THE CHAMBER IS WORRIED THAT THE NEW BUSINESSES HAVE INCLUDED SOME CHARITY SHOPS WHICH PAY NO RENT OR RATES. SHEERNESS USED TO BE A SEA-SIDE TOWN FOR HOLIDAY MAKERS WHICH BROUGHT TADE TO THE AREA BUT THIS HAS SLUMPED OFF IN RECENT YEARS SO THE TRADERS HAVE TO TRY HARDER TO ATTRACT THE CUSTOM OF LOCAL RESIDENTS.
